New Quest: Unraveling the Shadows of My Past

metadata.title: Unraveling the Shadows of My Past
metadata.description: Lysandra must delve into the ancient ruins and hidden secrets of The Shadowlands to uncover the truth about her lineage and the dark entity that haunts her. She will need to gather clues, decipher runes, and confront the remnants of a forgotten evil.

objectives.description: Explore the Cursed Well and retrieve an ancient artifact that may hold answers.
Study the Runes inscribed on The Gloomwatch Keep's walls to uncover hidden knowledge.
Speak with a shadowy figure in the keep and learn more about the entity that haunts Lysandra.
